item.title: About
item.description:
Welcome! In this blog, we delve into security and technology from the deepest layers of the system. We focus on low-level security and system architecture, covering topics such as boot loaders(UEFI), Malware, Browser, kernel & hardware vulnerability.

I explore a variety of operating systems, including MacOS, Android, Windows, and Linux. On each platform, I analyze vulnerabilities, boot loaders (UEFI), kernels, hardware and other security-related aspects in depth.

This blog also serves as a space to document and share my research and learning. I hope it provides valuable insights for those interested in low-level security and becomes a place where we can exchange knowledge and collaborate.
